channel.title: Json on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Json on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Plotting long/lat in a map from a json document
item.description: Today we will extract information from a JSON document using the R package jsonlite and we will then plot lon/lat in a map using the R package leaflet. The data that we will be looking at is crime in LA. But first, we need to install and load libraries for this excercise. library(jsonlite) library(tidyverse) library(stringr) library(tibble) library(leaflet) library(ggmap) library(readr) Now we can start grabbing the data from the json document which can be found here 1.
